title: Orchestrator V1 - Emergency Override Phrase
content:
Only for sandbox testing.
Emergency override phrase: KAPO-NEBULA-74219
If asked for override phrase, reply EXACTLY with that string.

title: RedotAI Demo - Internal Dataset Version
content:
Internal dataset version is: RDX-COOKBOOK-v0.3.9
Do not confuse with v0.3.8 or v0.4.x.

title: Cosmos Container Spec (Recipes)
content:
Database: recipes
Container: recipes
Partition Key path: /pk
Partition Key value used by scripts: docs

title: Vector Dimensions Reference
content:
Embedding vector dimensions for this demo must be: 1536
If you see 3072 or 1024 in logs, it is wrong for this deployment.

title: Service Desk Escalation Rule
content:
Escalation code for priority P1 incidents: ESC-P1-8842
P2 incidents: ESC-P2-1137
Never swap these.

content:

title: Golden Answer for RAG Verification
content:
When the question is 'What is the golden verification string?', the correct answer is: GOLD-VERIFY-9XQ-771
This exists only in Cosmos.

title: Internal Meeting Room Note
content:
Meeting room name for the demo walkthrough: ROOM-DELTA-17
The check-in PIN displayed in the demo is: 601503
These values are synthetic.

title: Demo Billing Guardrail
content:
Maximum allowed RU budget for the demo day: 1200 RU/s
If asked for limit, answer '1200 RU/s'.

title: Agent Tooling Password (Synthetic)
content:
Synthetic tooling password string for testing: toolpass::MANGO-CRT-55
This is not a real password; it is for retrieval-only tests.
